    • Method Detail

      • click

        @Step(value="Click Web Element")
public static void click(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elem)
        Method click perform click on the element. Method click has extended from Selenium method and have WebDriverWait instance. In this method, used if sentence to avoid executing of a wait.until function on mobile tests.
        Parameters:
        elem - is a web element that I perform click on it.

      • updateText

        @Step(value="Set Text to Text-Field")
public static void updateText(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elem,
                                                                     java.lang.String value)
        Method updateText perform setting text into the text field. Method updateText has extended from Selenium method and have WebDriverWait instance. In this method, used if sentence to avoid executing of a wait.until function on mobile tests.
        Parameters:
        elem - is a web element that I perform setting on it.
        value - is a text that I set in the text field.

      • uploadPhoto

        @Step(value="Upload Photo")
public static void uploadPhoto(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elem,
                                                            java.lang.String location)
        Method uploadPhoto perform uploading the image file into the web element. Method uploadPhoto has WebDriverWait instance.
        Parameters:
        elem - is a web element that I perform uploading on it.
        location - is a path of the image file.

      • languageDropDownList

        @Step(value="Set Text to DropDown List")
public static void languageDropDownList(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elem,
                                                                                  java.lang.String value)
        Method languageDropDownList perform language drop down list. Method languageDropDownList has Select instance class. Also I use method selectByVisibleText, it's check matching option of elements that are found
        Parameters:
        elem - is a web element of dropdown list.
        value - is a text of the list(any languages).

      • setDatePicker

        @Step(value="Set Date Picker ")
public static void setDatePicker(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elem,
                                                                  java.lang.String day)
        Method setDatePicker perform setting of date picker. Method setDatePicker has WebElement interface instance class.
        Parameters:
        elem - is a web element of the date widget.
        day - is a number of the day in any month.
